title: SET_VEHICLE_LIGHT_MULTIPLIER
content:
0xB385454F8791F57C0x48039D6A// SetVehicleLightMultiplier
void SET_VEHICLE_LIGHT_MULTIPLIER(Vehicle vehicle, float multiplier);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.multiplier: The multiplier applied to the vehicle's headlights.This multiplier has no limit, by default the game has this set to 1.0.
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleLightMultiplier
void SET_VEHICLE_LIGHT_MULTIPLIER(Vehicle vehicle, float multiplier);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_LIGHT_MULTIPLIER
SetVehicleLightMultiplier(vehicle, 0.0)
